## New company template

```JSON
{
    "name": "CompanyName",
    "career_page_url": "https://companyname.companytld/jobs",
    "url": "https://www.companyname.companytld/",
    "remote_policy": "Full",
    "hiring_policy": "Contract",
    "type": "B2B",
    "categories": [
        "cloud_software"
    ],
    "tags": [
        "PHP",
        "Go",
        "AWS"
    ]
}
```
